summary: A social-climbing American with a business in illegal gambling falls in love with a blue blood, but gangsters and a jealous ex-girlfriend stand in the way of happiness.
cast: Dane Clark|Kathleen Byron|Naomi Chance|Meredith Edwards|Anthony Forwood|Eric Pohlmann|Enzo Coticchia|Julian Somers|Anthony Ireland|Thomas Gallagher|Max Bacon|Mona Washbourne|Jane Griffiths|Richard Shaw|George Pastell|Martin Benson|Eric Boon|Felix Felton|Hal Osmond|Percy Marmont|Robert Adair|Paul Beradi|Robert Brown|Irissa Cooper|Fred Davis|Mabel Etherington|George Hilsdon|Peter Hutton|David Keir|Aileen Lewis|André Mikhelson|Prince Monolulu|Harold Sanderson|Paul Sheridan|Mark Singleton|Larry Taylor|Jim Tyson
keywords: british noir|pointing with middle finger|illegal gambling|gambler|gambling

title: Jugador y caballero
